summary: Alters the landscape near Merryfair Farm, just west of Riften Stables, by adding a bridge. This bridge connects the dirt road on the western side with a new trail leading off from the road at Merryfair Farm, allowing you to travel alongside the road on the northern shore of Lake Honric.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]Merryfair Bridge[/size]
by KhaoMaat

[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/9191-3-1329060982.png[/img][/center]
[size=3][b]Description:[/b][/size]
This mod alters the landscape near [b]Merryfair Farm[/b], just west of [b]Riften Stables[/b], by adding a bridge. This bridge connects the dirt road on the western side with a new trail leading off from the road at [b]Merryfair Farm[/b]. Also added is a road sign at the new intersection.

Now you can travel alongside the road on the northern shore of [b]Lake Honrich[/b] with relative ease. Just keep your head low while passing [b]Faldar's Tooth[/b]. An additional leveled creature ([b]easy[/b]) has also been placed near the bridge on the western side, identical to the one that already existed in the area.
author: KhaoMaat

files.name: Merryfair Bridge v1_1
files.changelogHtml: Slight changes such as flattening the dirt mound by the road sign and blending the bridge a bit more on the western side.
